snippet.title: Fate/Grand Order: Cosmos in the Lostbelt - Lostbelt No. 6 Act II - Beryl Ver.
snippet.description:
Masters! Prepare yourselves for "Lostbelt No.6: Fae Round Table Domain, Avalon le Fae - The Moment a Planet is Born" Act II!

"Chosen by the Staff of Selection, the savior, guarded by travelers from afar, shall reach the throne."

The key to the conquest of Britain is the defeat of Morgan, ruler of the Lostbelt.
The Song of Prophecy foretells her downfall once the Child of Prophecy journerys to ring the six Bells of Pilgrimage, protected by the six clans.
Also mentioned is a foreign mage―Chaldea's Master―who has been witnessed at the Child of Prophecy's side throughout Britain, giving credence to the divination.

Having earned an audience with the High Queen by warding off a Calamity, the party sets their sights on the fae capital―Camelot, the city of sin.
Prophecy and calamity. Faeries and humans.
What end awaits at the crossroads of fate once myriad expectations come into play?

For more information, please visit the official website: https://fate-go.us/avalon_2/ 

For more information check out Fate/Grand Order online!
Official website: https://fate-go.us/
Facebook: https://facebook.com/FateGO.USA/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FateGO_USA/
